instructions: If you're setting up HTC Desire 326G dual sim for the first time, tap Transfer my stuff . Or go to Settings, and then tap Get content from another phone . Choose whether to transfer from an Android phone, iPhone , or other phone types. Follow the onscreen instructions on HTC Desire 326G dual sim to turn on Bluetooth on your old phone and pair the two phones. On HTC Desire 326G dual sim , slide the Notifications panel open, and then tap Pairing request . When you see the passkey, tap Pair on both phones. After data has been transferred, tap Done .
